TopicTitle: Money mode ( i do not know what to call it!)

Articles.Content: The idea is, that you start with all the parts unlocked and all you have to worry about is money and rep. To make it slightly harder, let's say that you have to pay to hire Kerbals.

I see no need to have three separate Career modes, really. I think it would be much better to just roll Science Mode into Career mode entirely, and have both Science and Funds as toggleable settings under the custom difficulty settings. That way, you can easily use one, both, or neither, as you like.
